name: SmellChecker
0:
”Alexa, ask Smell Checker if Kieran smells.”
”Alexa, ask Smell Checker does Charlotte smell?”
”Alexa, ask Smell Checker to tell me if Malika smells.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smell checker
des:
Have a blocked nose? Do you smell? Does your friend smell? 
Ask Alexa!

With this skill, you'll easily be able to tell who smells and who doesn't.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
